promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young legendary lizard psychic-type pokemon holding a amethyst shield. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or lizard. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cryptalyst, a a chibi young legendary lizard psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Giga Burn, Prophecy. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lizard", "psychic" or "Cryptalyst". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, lizard-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: This mini leviathan, with a home in subterranean vaults, employs its Giga Burn and Prophecy abilities. Peering into tomorrow, it guides lost souls with flame light.
